pages.title: Pretty Sparkly Flowers
pages.text: In the $(thing)Everbright$() there blooms a rare flower - the $(item)Crystal Flower$(), whose petals are beautifully glassy, akin to crystal. A few hundred years ago, one of the old masters dropped one on his $(item)Natural Altar$() by accident, and in doing so discovered its nature could be transformed into an actual crystal, vibrantly humming with potent magic.
Remember, using the $(item)Natural Altar$() drains the local aura - be  careful not to drain too much.
While its luster is less than that of the $(thing)Everbright's$() $(item)Crystal Flower$(), a similar flower is found in the $(thing)Crystal Deserts$() of the $(thing)Everdawn$().

pages.heading: Transforming Flowers
pages.description: While the $(item)Crystal Flower$() is naturally rare, it seems exposing any flower from the $(thing)Everbright$() or $(thing)Everdawn$() to the magicks from your wand will transform them.
